attributes.action: Ban sale/use of fireworks. allow silent fireworks by events coordinators only
attributes.additional_details: We have had enough of seeing our animals scared, or dying as a result of fireworks and the safety issues around them. No animal should be allowed to suffer for something that isn’t even a necessity in our humane society. One animal dying as a result of a lax approach to the sale of, buying of, and using fireworks whenever they wish is one too many
attributes.background: Only silent fireworks should be sold bought and allowed in any organised event. Only organised events should be allowed to use them. No public persons should be allowed to buy or use fireworks, and used on restricted dates only

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

Limit the Sale and Use of Fireworks to Organisers of Licensed Displays Only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448
